mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sẽsuyuẽt les troys cens cinquãte Rõdeaulx moult siugnliers [sic] a tous propos nouuellement imprimes
Sensuyuent les troys cens cinquante Rondeaulx moult singuliers a tous propos nouuellement imprimes
Troys cens cinquante Rondeaulx
Rondeaulx
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Colophon: Imprime nouuellement a Lyon sur le rosne par Oliuier Arnoullet. Et furèt acheuez le xxv. de feburier. Mil.ccccc.xxxi. [original]
Attributed to Pierre Gringore. CF. Brunet, t. 3, col. 1753-1754. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Binder: M. Lortic. Bookplate of Jean Paul Barbier. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 708. [original]
